Articles.Content:
Hi all,

 

Hopefully a quick answer. I'm fooling around with SCANsat for the first time - could anyone please tell me what the icon with "LA" in it, to the very right of the screen, does? I notice it orients my craft when I press it and occasionally a window pops up with biome data, but can't quite figure it out.

Thanks in advance!

Link to example: http://imgur.com/MtcN7zz
I've been using scansat for a long time and I've never noticed an associated LA icon in the toolbar. Are you sure it's not from another mod?
Appreciate the replies guys, thank you! I'll play around with the mods then and see if I can figure out which one it is.
